trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trRemoveWeapon
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local playa = GetPlayerVehicle() if playa then playa:SetPosition(StringToCVector(GetVar("BonusWeaponRemoveSavedPos").AsString)) end

trigger.Name: RestoreTolerance
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() RestoreAllToleranceStatus()

trigger.Name: trStartMap
trigger.script:
RuleConsole("currentRadarScanRadius 100")
local r_l = { "point_1_1", "point_1_2", "point_2_1", "point_2_2", "point_2_3" } for i, v in r_l do local l = getObj( v ) CreateNewSgNodeObject( "ET_LS_RADIATION_LIGHTING", "rl_".. v, -1, -1, l:GetPosition() + CVector( 0, 2.5, 0 ) ) CreateNewSgNodeObject( "ET_PS_GREEN_SMOKE1", "rls_".. v, -1, -1, l:GetPosition() + CVector( 0, 2.5, 0 ) ) end trigger:Deactivate()
local tables = {{10, 10}, {189, 198}, {1212, 1229}} ShroomCalc(tables) SetVar("ShroomCalcParam", "{870, 30, 40000}") -- minReward, maxReward, maxBonus, reachable SetVar("Checkpoints", 0)

trigger.Name: trGameSart
trigger.script:
function SaveGame( name ) rockFall = rockFall or {} local str = "Nav = " .. serialize ( Nav ) .. "; " local str = str .. "Ambushs = " .. serialize ( Ambushs ) .. "; " local str = str .. "rockFall = " .. serialize ( rockFall ) .. "; " --dostring( "a = serialize ( Nav )") SetVar( "SavedTables", str ) SavesManager:SaveCheckpoint( name ) end
function LoadingGame() local str = GetVar( "SavedTables" ).AsString dostring( str ) end
local loaded = GetVar( "loaded" ).AsInt OnAnyRestart() if ( loaded == -1 ) or ( loadedStatus == "firstLoad" ) then loadedStatus = "Loaded" SetVar( "loaded", 1 ) LOG("TRIGGERS: SEE - GAME STARTED SUSSFULLLL") TActivate("trStartMap") TActivate("trStartQuest") TActivate("trAmbInit") TActivate("trNavInit") -- TActivate("trRockFallInit") TActivate("trRadiationInit") TActivate("trBurnInit") -- TActivate("trStormInit") -- TActivate("trTimersInit") TActivate("trJumpCamInit") else LoadingGame() LOG("SEE - GAME LOADED SUSSFULLLL") end

trigger.Name: trAmbInit
trAmbStart
trigger.script:
local loc = trigger:GetCallObjName() trigger:DelEventObj( "GE_OBJECT_ENTERS_LOCATION", loc )
local amb = nil for i,v in Ambushs do if v.onEnter == loc then amb = v break end end
local belong = amb.belong or (1110 + math.random(4))
CreateTeam( "ambTeam_"..amb.onEnter , belong, getPos( amb.onSpawn ), amb.spawnTeam, getPos( loc ))

trigger.Name: trNavInit
trNavWork
trigger.script: CompasWork( trigger )

trigger.Name: NavDraw
trigger.script: CompasShow( trigger )

trigger.Name: trBonusText_00
trigger.script: TakeQuest( "ng1_dv6_t0" ) CompleteQuest( "ng1_dv6_t0" ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBonusText_01
trigger.script: TakeQuest( "ng1_dv6_t1" ) CompleteQuest( "ng1_dv6_t1" ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trStartQuest
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() CompasOn( 2, 1 ) --Квест стартовый включить TakeQuest( "ng1_dv6_q1" ) FlyShort ( { time = 7 , msg = { 6001, 60011, 60012, 60013 }} ) -- CompleteQuest( "dv2_q1" ) --quest_bomb создать BubbleId = CreateNewSgNodeObject( "quest_bomb", "quest_bomb", -1, 1101, getPos("Way_05") + CVector( 0, 4, 0 ) ) local Bubble = getObj( BubbleId )

trigger.Name: trTriggerQuest1
trigger.script: SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) FlyShort ( { time = 7 , msg = { 6002, 6003, 60000, 60001, 60002, 60031, 60035, 60036, 60037, 60038 }, CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv6_q1", saveMap ="ng1_dv6_AfterProf" } ) TakeQuest( "ng1_dv6_q1_2" ) -- CompleteQuest( "dv6_q1" ) trigger:Deactivate() TActivate( "trBombTake" ) CompasOn( 5, 3 )

trigger.Name: trBombTake
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() TActivate( "trBombTakeComplete" ) bomb = getObj( "quest_bomb" ) bomb_pos = getPos("Way_05") + CVector( 0, 4, 0 )

trigger.Name: trBombTakeComplete
trigger.script:
trigger:IncCount() local c = trigger:GetCount() if bomb then -- bomb_pos = bomb_pos + CVector(0, sin( c * 5 )* 2 ,0) bomb:SetPosition( bomb_pos + CVector(0, sin( c * 5 )* 1.5 )) end
if trigger:GetCount() == 150 then trigger:Deactivate() bomb:Remove() CompasOn( 13, 6 ) TActivate( "trTimeCheck" ) TActivate( "trBomb1" ) --TActivate( "trBomb1_x" ) TActivate( "trBomb2" ) --TActivate( "trBomb2_x" )
FlyShort ( { time = 7 , msg = { 6004, 60051, 60052, 6005 }, CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv6_q1_2" } )
-- CompleteQuest( "dv6_q1_2" ) TakeQuest( "ng1_dv6_q2" ) HudTimer:Start( 20 * 60 ) QuestCounter:Setup( 2 ) QuestCounter:Show()
TActivate( "Save00" ) end

trigger.Name: Save00
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() SavesManager:SaveCheckpoint( "ng1_dv6_startRun" )

trigger.Name: trBomb1
trigger.script: p("trBomb1") trigger:Deactivate() SetVar( "Bomb1", 30 ) TActivate("BombCounter") local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(1527.648, 287.971, 3314.674) ) vehPlayer:SetRotation( qua( 130 ) ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end CameraModeTurrelM() FlyShort ( { time = 1 , msg = { }} )

trigger.Name: trBomb1_x
trigger.script: p("trBomb1_x") TDeactivate("BombCounter") TDeactivate( "trBomb1" ) TDeactivate( "trBomb1_x" ) SetVar( "Bomb1", -1 )

trigger.Name: trBomb2
trigger.script: p("trBomb2") trigger:Deactivate() SetVar( "Bomb2", 30 ) TActivate("BombCounter") local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector( 1107.203, 250.248, 683.804 ) ) vehPlayer:SetRotation( qua( 20 ) ) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) end CameraModeTurrelM() FlyShort ( { time = 1 , msg = { }} )

trigger.Name: trBomb2_x
trigger.script: p("trBomb2_x") TDeactivate("BombCounter") TDeactivate( "trBomb2" ) TDeactivate( "trBomb2_x" ) SetVar( "Bomb2", -1 )

trigger.Name: BombCounter
trigger.script:
p("BombCounter") local Bomb1 = GetVar( "Bomb1" ).AsInt local Bomb2 = GetVar( "Bomb2" ).AsInt
if Bomb1 > 0 then Bomb1 = Bomb1 - 1 SetVar( "Bomb1", Bomb1 ) --печатать счетчик взрыва -- AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( "fm_time", 0, 0, Bomb1 ) end if Bomb2 > 0 then Bomb2 = Bomb2 - 1 SetVar( "Bomb2", Bomb2 ) --печатать счетчик взрыва -- AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted( "fm_time", 0, 0, Bomb2 ) end
if Bomb1 == 0 then trigger:Deactivate() TDeactivate( "trBomb1" ) TDeactivate( "trBomb1_x" ) SetVar( "Bomb1", -2 ) CompasOn( 11, 9 )
local r_l = { "point_1_1", "point_1_2" } for i, v in r_l do local l = getObj( v ) SafeRemove( "rl_"..v ) SafeRemove( "rls_"..v ) CreateNewSgNodeObject( "ET_PS_HOUSE_MED_FIRE", "rlf_".. v, -1, -1, l:GetPosition() ) CreateNewSgNodeObject( "ET_PS_VEH_EXP1_MED1", "rlex_".. v, -1, -1, l:GetPosition() ) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_VEH_PART_BLOW_SMALL_CAB", l:GetPosition() - CVector(0,1.5,0), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 11000) end
QuestCounter:IncValue(1) TActivate( "trSave2" ) CameraModeRaceM() end if Bomb2 == 0 then trigger:Deactivate() TDeactivate( "trBomb2" ) TDeactivate( "trBomb2_x" ) SetVar( "Bomb2", -2 ) TActivate("trWin1") CompasOff()
local r_l = { "point_2_1", "point_2_2", "point_2_3" } for i, v in r_l do local l = getObj( v ) SafeRemove( "rl_"..v ) SafeRemove( "rls_"..v ) CreateNewSgNodeObject( "ET_PS_HOUSE_MED_FIRE", "rlf_".. v, -1, -1, l:GetPosition() ) CreateNewSgNodeObject( "ET_PS_VEH_EXP1_MED1", "rlex_".. v, -1, -1, l:GetPosition() ) CreateEffectTTLed("ET_PS_VEH_PART_BLOW_SMALL_CAB", l:GetPosition() - CVector(0,1.5,0), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 1.0000), 11000) end
QuestCounter:IncValue(1) CameraModeRaceM() end

trigger.Name: trWin1
trigger.script:
local Bomb1 = GetVar( "Bomb1" ).AsInt local Bomb2 = GetVar( "Bomb2" ).AsInt if Bomb1 + Bomb2 == -4 then SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) FlyShort ( { time = 4 , msg = { 6006, 60061, 60062, 60065 }, CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv6_q2", saveMap ="ng1_dv6_Clearing"} ) TakeQuest( "ng1_dv6_q2_2" ) -- CompleteQuest( "dv6_q2" ) TActivate( "trBurnZombie" ) CompasOn( 8, 10 ) HudTimer:Stop()
TDeactivate( "trTimerLose" ) QuestCounter:Hide()
--SafeRemove("Cemetery_01") 19
trigger:Deactivate()
TActivate("trShroomNote2") end

trigger.Name: trTimerLose
trigger.script: --!!! Тиме даун trigger:Deactivate() GetPlayerVehicle():AddModifier( "hp", "- 1000000" )

trigger.Name: trBurnZombie
trigger.script:
-- CompleteQuest( "dv6_q2_2" ) if 3>=GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt then SpawnMessageBox( "369" ) local playa = GetPlayerVehicle() if playa then playa:AddModifier("hp", "- 1337") end else trigger:Deactivate() TActivate("trWin") FlyShort ( { time = 5 , msg = { 6007, 6008, 60081, 60082, 60083 }, CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv6_q2_2", removeWeapon = 1} )
local shroomCalcParam = StringToTable(GetVar("ShroomCalcParam").AsString) ShroomRewardGive(shroomCalcParam[1], shroomCalcParam[2], shroomCalcParam[3]) end

trigger.Name: trSave2
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) SaveGame( "ng1_dv6_AfterFirstTrck" )

trigger.Name: trSave4
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) SaveGame( "ng1_dv6_BeforeFortress" )

trigger.Name: trWin
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() loadedStatus = "firstLoad" Intermission:Show("ng1_dv7", "locStart", 165)

trigger.Name: trShroomNote1
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
AddImportantFadingMsgId("fm_player_notification_received") AddFadingMsgId("fm_player_shroom_bonus_notification")

trigger.Name: trShroomNote2
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local shroomCalcParam = StringToTable(GetVar("ShroomCalcParam").AsString) AddImportantFadingMsgId("fm_player_notification_received") AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_player_shroom_bonus_complete", ShroomRewardCalc(shroomCalcParam[1], shroomCalcParam[2], shroomCalcParam[3]))
